text: @AngrierWHStaff Just think, if both Trump and Pence bite the dust from Coronavirus, then Nancy Pelosi who is staying safe at home wearing her mask when she needs to, & who has refused to place the 400+ House mbrs in danger by calling them back to DC, will become President of the United States.
